io.openhc.ohc.skynet

Class Receiver

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • io.openhc.ohc.skynet.udp.Receiver

  • public class Receiver
extends <any>
    UDP packet receiver. Automatically interprets UDP packets as JSON data, parses and checks it and tries to make a RPC from it
    Author:
    Tobias Schramm
